Hello , everyone.
I just finished a slides on copula function and copula entropy, which may give a new understanding of entropy. The slide can be download at my researchgate page

https://www.researchgate.net/publication/387227889_Copula_Operad_and_Copula_Entropy .

This work is motivated by theory of remormalization group and coarse-grainings.
It is well known that there are several categorical understand about entropy by many people, such as Baez, Leinster, ... Here I give a different perspective.
Of course, this is just the first step to this new approach.

If you have any suggestions or comments, please tell me.
Thanks.

Best wishes,
Xuexing Lu
